Liver Institute, Menoufia University, Egypt

College of Medicine, King Faisal University, Saudi Arabia[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Biography” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left|color:%231e73be” google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:900%20bold%20regular%3A900%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1659569771106{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text]Last Saudi Arabia Appointment:
Anaesthesia Consultant, King Fahad National Guard Hospital, Riyadh, Kingdom Saudi Arabia. Participated in the initial programme for live donor liver transplantation of Saudi Arabia 2001-2007.
Qualifications: (Degrees, Diplomas, Licenses, Board Certifications)
• FFARCSI, Ireland 1997, MD in Anaesthesia, Ain Sham University 1994,
Recent Books Publications
Joint Contribution in Management of Bleeding patients. Second edition
• Jun Teruya, Texas Children’s Hospital, USA
• Chapter: Bleeding Related to Liver Transplant
• Klaus Görlinger, Tetsuro Sakai, Daniel Dirkmann,
• Raymond Planinsic , Khaled Yassen and Fuat H. Saner
• From
University Hospital Essen, Germany
University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine, USA
National Liver Institute, Menoufia University, Egypt

Second Contribution In
• Yassen K. (2021) Anaesthesia for Live Donor Hepatectomy. In: Milan Z., Goonasekera C. (eds) Anesthesia for Hepatico-Pancreatic-Biliary Surgery and Transplantation. Springer, Cham[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row]
